waymo , the self-driving unit of alphabet , said on monday it had raised $2.25 billion in its first external investment round. the company also disclosed its self-driving trucking business will be called waymo via
in addition to alphabet , initial investors include auto parts supplier magna international. autonation said it invested $50 million as part of the initial funding round
investment bank morgan stanley slashed its projected valuation of waymo to $105 billion. it said the commercialization of self-driving vehicles and technology was taking longer than expected
